about_the_game:
Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Revontuli Coast.

This Pack Contains:

- Revontuli Coast Grey Paint
- Revontuli Coast Dark Brown Paint
- Revontuli Coast Brown Paint
- Revontuli Coast Light Brown Paint
- Revontuli Coast Dark Grey Paint
- Revontuli Coast Branches Spray
- Revontuli Coast Twigs Spray
- Revontuli Coast Frost Spray
- Revontuli Coast Claro Walnut Wood
- Revontuli Coast Birch Wood
- Revontuli Coast Flektarn Camo
- Revontuli Coast Waterfowl Camo
- Revontuli Coast Leaves Camo
- Revontuli Coast Premium Wrap

The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.
